question: What is the Versene Solution used for?
ideal_answer: the Versene Solution is used for the detachment of stem cell sheets.

snippets.text: in 0.01 versene solution, containing 0.011% w/v trypsin (Difco), 0.4 mg/ml D-glucose, 0.17 mg/ml KCl, 1.7 mg/ml NaCl.
stem cell sheets detached by Versene solution
The object of study was follicular thyroid carcinoma cells suspension prepared with use of Versene solution and 0.25% trypsin solution.
